    • Method Detail

      • sendEthOffchainTransaction

        public BroadcastResult sendEthOffchainTransaction​(boolean testnet,
                                                  TransferEthOffchain body,
                                                  String provider)
                                           throws Exception
        Send Ethereum transaction from Tatum Ledger account to the blockchain. This method broadcasts signed transaction to the blockchain. This operation is irreversible.
        Parameters:
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the broadcast result
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • sendEthErc20OffchainTransaction

        public BroadcastResult sendEthErc20OffchainTransaction​(boolean testnet,
                                                       TransferEthErc20Offchain body,
                                                       String provider)
                                                throws Exception
        Send Ethereum ERC20 transaction from Tatum Ledger account to the blockchain. This method broadcasts signed transaction to the blockchain. This operation is irreversible.
        Parameters:
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the broadcast result
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • signEthOffchainKMSTransaction

        public String signEthOffchainKMSTransaction​(TransactionKMS tx,
                                            String fromPrivateKey,
                                            boolean testnet,
                                            String provider)
                                     throws Exception
        Sign Ethereum pending transaction from Tatum KMS
        Parameters:
        tx - pending transaction from KMS
        fromPrivateKey - private key to sign transaction with.
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • prepareEthSignedOffchainTransaction

        public PrepareEthTx prepareEthSignedOffchainTransaction​(String amount,
                                                        String privateKey,
                                                        String address,
                                                        Currency currency,
                                                        org.web3j.protocol.Web3j web3,
                                                        String gasPrice,
                                                        BigInteger nonce)
                                                 throws Exception
        Sign Ethereum transaction with private keys locally. Nothing is broadcast to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount to send
        privateKey - private key to sign transaction and send funds from
        address - recipient address
        currency - Ethereum or supported ERC20
        web3 - instance of the web3 client
        gasPrice - gas price of the blockchain fee
        nonce - nonce of the transaction. this is counter of the transactions from given address. should be + 1 from previous one.
        Returns:
        the prepare eth tx
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • prepareEthErc20SignedOffchainTransaction

        public PrepareEthTx prepareEthErc20SignedOffchainTransaction​(String amount,
                                                             String privateKey,
                                                             String address,
                                                             org.web3j.protocol.Web3j web3,
                                                             String tokenAddress,
                                                             String gasPrice,
                                                             BigInteger nonce)
                                                      throws ExecutionException,
                                                             InterruptedException
        Sign Ethereum custom ERC20 transaction with private keys locally. Nothing is broadcast to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount to send
        privateKey - private key to sign transaction and send funds from
        address - recipient address
        web3 - instance of the web3 client
        tokenAddress - blockchain address of the custom ERC20 token
        gasPrice - gas price of the blockchain fee
        nonce - nonce of the transaction. this is counter of the transactions from given address. should be + 1 from previous one.
        Returns:
        the prepare eth tx
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - the execution exception
        InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
